about_the_game:
Wheel Riders Online - Premium Pack vol.1
Contains a complete set of parts for vehicles and paints. All the available content presented in the game goes to you immediately, which will expand your opportunities in building your transport and improve your performance in battles against other players.
The kit includes:
-All items from the category - The basis.
-All items from the category - Cabins.
-All items from the category - Wheels.
-All items from the category - Decorations.
-All items from the category - Paints.
-All items from the category - Equipment.
-All items from the category - Weapons.
-All items from the category - Constructions.
---
Wheel Riders Online - Survival Racing. You will build your own mode transportation using the parts in your garage and battle other players online! A very entertaining automobile building system is waiting for you, don't let your fantasy limit you; moreover, those constant improvements are adding to your abilities. A huge armored tank of a fast, small sports car - the choice is yours! Build a team out of your friends and their unique cars and go on huge and diverse tracks for battle! Find your own tactic with your friends. Use abilities of every map to destroy your opponent and surprise other online players!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo, 2.4 GHz / AMD Athlon X2, 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GTS / AMD Radeon 3850
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 750, 2.67 GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 965, 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX или AMD Radeon 6870 HD или лучше
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
